attributes.action: David and Vanessa Read of Norwich.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We cannot believe what you are going to do to the 9 million drivers, with these 
so called green taxes [us included]. There will be a revolt against you. we have voted Labour in our family for 60 years but not anymore you and your policies are crippling the working class.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
